text: Reichman University is a private university in Herzliya, Israel. Until the year 2020, it was known as "Herzliya Interdisciplinary Center". == Other websites == *Interdisciplinary Center *IDC Student Union *IDC International Radio Category:Colleges and universities in Israel Category:1994 establishments in Asia Category:1990s establishments in Israel Category:Tel Aviv District
title: Herzliya Interdisciplinary Center
